title: Beachfront Duqm Oasis Moments Away from Arabian Sea
description: Experience the golden glow of a desert oasis, set on a paradisiacal stretch of Duqm Beach, with a seaside escape to Crowne Plaza Duqm, an IHG Hotel. From the infinity pool that floats over the beach, step onto the pecten-shelled bay and feel the crisp Arabian Sea as you wander the shoreline. After days of traversing undulating sand dunes, indulge in a spa treatment, refuel with fresh seafood at Al Safi Restaurant or head to The Frontier Restaurant and Sports Pub for live entertainment.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Duqm, an IHG Hotel
